title: T205 for sale -- new to the hobby -- reduced before move to eBay
author: AndrewJerome

posts.post_title: T205 for sale -- new to the hobby -- reduced before move to eBay
posts.post_content:
T205 cards below range from PR to VG+, and are priced accordingly. All cards are new to the hobby. Email for larger scans or with any questions. First person to indicate “I’ll take it” will secure a card/cards.  Check / m.o. or paypal gift preferred. I will cover shipping. Thanks for looking,

Andrew

[url]callmefugazi@yahoo.com[/url]
